email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Sarah, We are looking to ship 25,000MT of iron ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for a laycan of November 10-15? Best regards, John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR, DWT 85,000, LOA 220m, for your shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 42.50 per MT. Laycan is confirmed for November 10-15. Please let us know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Negotiation for Iron Ore Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thank you for the prompt response. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market trends. Could you consider revising it to USD 40.00 per MT? We are ready to finalize the deal quickly if the rate is adjusted. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear John, After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 41.00 per MT. This is our best offer considering the current demand and vessel availability. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the booking. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Acceptance of Revised Freight Quote
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, We accept the revised rate of USD 41.00 per MT. Please proceed with the booking for MV OCEAN STAR with the laycan of November 10-15. Could you also confirm the demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Booking and Demurrage Terms
email_chain.body: Dear John, Thank you for your confirmation. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day, applicable only if the vessel exceeds the agreed laydays. We will send the contract shortly for your review and signature. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Confirmation and Contract Details
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Everything looks good. We will review the contract and get back to you with the signed copy by end of day. Thank you for your assistance. Best, John
